name: Probate 02D02-2502-ES*
description:
These codes are for estates and probate type case files

Navigate to the Website:

Go to https://public.courts.in.gov/mycase/#/vw/Search.
Search for the Case:

In the search field (labeled "Case Number" or similar), enter""02D02-2502-ES*"
View the Search Results:

After clicking search, you will be taken to the search results page.
Process Each Result:

For every case/task that appears in the results, perform the following:

Click on the Individual Result:

Open the case file by clicking on the result.
Collect All Information on the Case Page:

Extract the following details from each case file:
Case Number: The unique identifier for the case.
Court: The court in which the case is filed.
Type: The type/category of the case.
Filed Date: The date the case was filed.
Status: The current status of the case.
Date of Status: The date when the current status was recorded.
Decedent Details:
Decedent name(s)
Decedent address(es)
(Note: There may be multiple decedents. Extract all listed names and addresses.)
Personal Representative Details:
Personal representative name(s)
Personal representative address(es)
(Note: There may be multiple personal representatives. Extract all listed names and addresses.)
Petitioner Details:
Petitioner name(s)
Petitioner address(es)
(Note: There may be multiple petitioners. Extract all listed names and addresses.)
Attorney Details:
Attorney name(s)
Attorney address(es)
Attorney Phone number(s)
(Note: There may be multiple attorneys. Extract all listed names and addresses.)
Date of Death: The recorded date of death.
Full Timeline of the Case: A complete chronological record of the case events.
Balance Due: Any balance or fees currently due.
Expand all dropdowns (for decedent, personal representative, petitioner, and any timeline events) to ensure all information is visible.
Collect all the information on the page in case there is another data type that is needed at a later point.
Return to the Results:

Once all the required information has been gathered from the case file, click the back button to return to the search results page.
Navigate Within the Page:

Scroll down to view the next task if needed.
Handle Pagination:

After collecting all the results on the current page, navigate to the next page.
Continue this process until all pages have been completed.
